forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
The morning air in Downtown San Francisco cradles a gentle sun, casting its golden warmth over the city. Today, the skies are a brilliant blue, devoid of any fog or marine layer, allowing a clear view of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and the vibrant skyline. As the day unfolds, temperatures will gradually dip from a pleasant high, inviting locals to shed their layers, yet keeping a light jacket handy as the afternoon brings a slight chill, especially near the waterfront. 

For those journeying through the city, this splendid weather beckons for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a casual coffee at a sun-drenched café. The crispness of the evening will settle in softly, and as the twilight deepens, it's a perfect time to unwind outdoors or perhaps catch a sunset. Whether seeking companionship in conversation or solace in solitude, this day offers a canvas painted with possibility and simple pleasures.
